name: Galaga
overview: Homebrew shooter for the C64 that uses PETSCII graphics. While the game is called Galaga, it actually is more of a clone of Galaxian since unlike Galaga, there are no ships that take yours, nor can you take back your ship and get a double fighter. The aliens come in formation from left and right: destroy them before they destroy your spaceship! Published as Aliens in Italy's COM 64 n.1 (dicembre 1984).
